features: Anti- Aging: Hyaluronic Acid helps to maintain skin elasticity making it the perfect anti aging face moisturizer for women and men. Our face moisturizers smooth the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. Retinol, among other ingredients help to further slow the aging process!

Long-Lasting Hydration: Dry, thirsty skin can make you look older and tired. The aloe found in our facial skin care products provides a soothing splash of hydration! Your complexion will feel smoother and appear younger, healthier and simply radiant!

Revitalizes Skin: Our hyaluronic acid moisturizer for skin improves your complexion for a younger appearance! Retinol, Vitamin B Complex, Vitamin E, CoQ10, Green Tea, Rose Hip and other ingredients all help to hydrate and nourish skin! It even improves crow's feet around your eyes.

Spa-Quality Formula: Our Hyaluronic Acid Cream face moisturizer is manufactured with the highest quality ingredients to help slow the aging process and rejuvenate skin. With this retinol night cream, brings the spa treatment experience to you with these skin care products, all without the overwhelming price, but with all the results.

Eva Naturals Gaurantee: The best anti aging face cream for woman & men. This anti aging cream with retinol increases collagen and elastin production to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and age spots.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eva Natural's Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer Hyaluronic Acid helps to maintain skin elasticity making it the perfect anti aging moisturizer. It smooths the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. It even improves crow's feet around your eyes.

Try Our Skin Clearing Bundle Including our 1oz Vitamin C + Serum, 4oz Vitamin C+ Toner, and our Skin Clearing Spot Treatment & Mask, Our Skin Clearing Bundle reduces breakouts and soothes troubled skin for a more even skin tone! Try Now Try Our Skin Brightening Serum Thanks to our Skin Brightening Serum, signs of aging are completely optional! Licorice and Vitamin E team up to gently fade hyperpigmentation, reducing the appearance of stubborn age spots. Try Now Try Our Skin Perfecting Serum Why over-complicate your skincare routine with countless serums, and creams? Address all of your skin concerns, including lines, blemishes, damage, and dehydration with our Skin Perfecting Serum. Try Now Try Our Vitamin E Oil Compliment your complexion with Our Vitamin E Oil. Vitamin E helps reduce, scars, dryness, redness, and swelling. Try Now Try Our Skin Brightening Cream Our Skin Brightening Cream is specifically formulated with gentle ingredients, safe for sensitive skin and all skin types. Reduce the appearance of acne scars, dark spots, and sun spots! Try Now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this with other products from the same brand. I really like this moisturizer! It is smooth and hydrating! It leaves my skin smooth and does not leave a greasy feeling! I used to wake up with a lot of oil when using other moisturizers, but this one does not do that! My skin has not been dry and I my pores look smaller. My skin looks and feels so much healthier! I will be purchasing this again, and trying the other moisturizers from this line!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this cream
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. It really plumps up my skin. Also, it is a great value for the quality you get. I have been using the Eva naturals products for a couple of months and I am sticking with them in my beauty routine because the products really work. I am nearing 60 and I truly see a difference in my wrinkles. My skin is smoother, plumper and my wrinkles, well, they are still there, but overall, look a bit smoother. There is no miracle cream for making them go away! I also love the texture. It is not sticky and doesn’t leave a film after application. My skin really absorbs the cream very well. I like the dispenser. The pump is easy to handle. I have early onset arthritic hands and I can’t put too much pressure on pumps. The dispenser is large and easy to work with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it so far!
reviews.reviewText: This is an early review but this has been my experience so far. I’m 36 with some wrinkles under my eyes ( crows feet)I’ve been using this for just 10 days so I have not seen any major improvements in wrinkles just yet. But i will say it does moisturize very well without feeling heavy. It’s nice and light. I use it on my entire face, under eyes, eye lids, my neck and chest. It’s a bout a pump and half to two pumps per application.Keep in mind that scientifically It takes about 6-8 weeks to see results with any products.I would like to mention that I do have very sensitive skin. I’ve had no bad reactions with this. It doesn’t even burn my eyes like some creams and serums. It makes my skin very soft and it absorbs pretty quickly. But I usually wait about 10 minutes before applying my foundation. I use this in the mornings and at night before bed, right after washing my face or showering. Products work better when your pores are open by the way.This doesn’t have much of a scent either which is great.I’ll continue to use this until it’s gone, then decide if I’ll continue to purchase more. You can’t beat the price of $11 then it has a $2 off coupon. To me it’s worth trying. I’ve spent $60-$100 on wrinkle creams before and there was no difference. Just less money in my pocket....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All Eva products are perfection
reviews.reviewText: I have so many products from Eva I have ordered before the moisturizer is just light weight and non greasy just perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It depends on your skin.
reviews.reviewText: As far as aloe products goes, this is one of the smellier ones. I usually try products out for a month to see how it would affect my skin, usually my face, and go from there. I used this after I ran out of another product called Aloe Infusion Body and Face Moisturizer.From what I experienced it's not bad. It goes on well and doesn't leave a slimy or greasy residue though that aloe smell lingers until it's truly dry or absorbed through the skin I suppose? I wouldn't say it's malodorous exactly but I've smelled worse and it's not like it's gag inducing. I also look for products that are as natural as possible and doesn't have so many ingredients and this one is pretty nice.Unfortunately it's given me a few pimples here and there while the one that I replaced with this did not so I'm gonna go back to using that one. Just sad that it's so darn expensive. I'd make my own, and I have, but I get lazy and/or preoccupied. Sue me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect amount of hydration for daytime. I also use it as a base for a night sleeping oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product works!
reviews.reviewText: This cream is moisturizing, no scent, and it's a medium weight. It's perfect for bedtime. I looked in the mirror a few months ago and did not like the look of my skin. It looked like it belonged to an old, old woman. I was appalled. I searched out the creams with the ingredient I had gleaned from the internet to see what I needed. I use another product in the am, they seem to work great together! And the price is awesome. I definitely recommend this product. It does not promote acne, so my skin stays nice and supple without any breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good face cream
reviews.reviewText: This product is best used at night as it is on the thicker side , so very little goes a long way. It may not be the best for very humid environments.It has a barely detectable herbal-ish scent.Overall a good face cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used this face cream for sometime and find it perfect and very good value. Highly recommended
J'aime beaucoup cet article. Je ne l'utilise pas tous les soirs, j'alterne avec une crème hydratante.

Trovo questa crema molto buona , dopo pochi giorni la mia pelle è già molto più morbida. La uso dopo il siero della stessa marca al retinolo. Il primo giorno alcune aree del viso si sono leggermente arrossate ma già dal secondo giorno non è più successo.Ne basta poca, è una crema molto ricca.
This is a great cream with its hydrating moisturising properties and has lightened my pigmentation a lot.
